nodes.text: Drelliad bracers first appeared as an item of medium armor in the Massively multiplayer online roleplaying game Star Wars: The Old Republic published by BioWare in 2011. The item is available as a reward to characters of the smuggler class for the completion of a quest in their classes storyline. The item can only be acquired in this way and so other classes can only obtain it through trading and Imperial players currently cannot obtain it. The bracer's relation to Drelliad village, if any, is unknown.
